transcript.text:
￼














Store Setup


Site Settings
Images Tab

2 min
purpose these are the settings that help you manage the display of images on the website settings there are 3 settings in this tab for managing the image's display, maximum crop width and maximum crop height of the user images no of user images to be displayed per page – front no of user images to be displayed per page – front with this setting, you can manage the number of images to be displayed under the my account >> my images section for customers this will enable a previous and next button when the number of user images to fail to fit in one screen maximum crop image width for user images – front maximum crop image width for user images – front this setting allows you to set maximum crop image width for user images the default width set is '420' maximum crop image height for user images – front maximum crop image height for user images – front this setting allows you to set maximum crop image height for user images the default height set is '400'
Did this page help you?
